sentences.english: This conclusion plays an important theoretical guiding role in ESG designing and testing.
sentences.chinese: 其结论对静电陀螺仪的设计与测试具有理论指导意义。

sentences.english: The gyroscope in tank is used to stabilize the aim system of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 坦克中的陀螺仪用于稳定火炮的瞄准系统。

sentences.english: Check gyro and do not reset remainder of approach.
sentences.chinese: 检查陀螺仪，进近时勿再拨置。

sentences.english: These formulas are valid for all attitude work of an ESG.
sentences.chinese: 计算公式适用于静电陀螺仪全姿态工作。

sentences.english: It's powered by electricity using wheelchair motors and gyroscopic technology to make it move.
sentences.chinese: 它由电力驱动，用轮椅车马达与陀螺仪技术使之运行。

sentences.english: So, gyros alone can't be used to keep in an aircraft in a particular orientation.
sentences.chinese: 因此，单独使用陀螺仪也无法保持飞机的特定航向。

sentences.english: Missile gyros are spun up, and they're ready to fly.
sentences.chinese: 导弹陀螺仪的旋转起来，他们已经准备好飞行。

sentences.english: By repeating the best process, the vacuum sealing of the micro gyro is accomplished successfully.
sentences.chinese: 在该工艺参数下，成功的完成了微陀螺仪的真空封帽。

sentences.english: Firstly, this thesis researches the dynamic equation of micromachined gyros.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先研究了微机械陀螺仪的动力学方程。

sentences.english: The telescope's six gyroscopes , which keep it steady, are failing one by one.
sentences.chinese: 能使哈勃保持稳定的六个陀螺仪正一个一个的失效。

sentences.english: At present, the electrostatic suspended gyroscope (ESG) is the most precise inertia instrument in the world.
sentences.chinese: 静电陀螺仪是目前世界上最高精度的惯性器件。

sentences.english: Sims will now finish eating gyros.
The results obtained have instructive function for brazing technology of gyro housing.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果对陀螺仪壳体的钎焊工艺具有指导意义。

sentences.english: The passengers' riding comfort and response time of gyroscopes are considered.
sentences.chinese: 计算中考虑了乘客乘坐舒适性和陀螺仪的响应时间。

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3

definition: to diverge (from bearing, flight path etc)/off course/to yaw
